bibl.title: Fontes Historiae Nubiorum. Textual Sources for the History of the Middle Nile Region between the Eighth Century BC and the Sixth Century AD. Vol. III: From the First to the Sixth Century AD.
bibl.seg: EIDE Tormod, Tomas HÄGG, Richard Holton PIERCE and László TÖRÖK, Fontes Historiae Nubiorum. Textual Sources for the History of the Middle Nile Region between the Eighth Century BC and the Sixth Century AD. Vol. III: From the First to the Sixth Century AD.

C.R. par Richard Alston, CR N.S., 48 (1998) pp. 539-540. - Emmanuel Louant, AntCl 67 (1998) p. 447. - Richard Alston, CR N.S., 50 (2000) pp. 347-348. - Jean Bingen, ChrEg 74 (1999) No. 148, pp. 386-388.
